item.title: Goodbye to deauthorizations
item.dc:creator: Rob Miracle
item.description: You can now run Corona SDK on more than two computers! Read further to learn more about this change.
item.content:encoded:
In the past we have limited everyone’s ability to run Corona on a maximum of two computers. This made sense when Corona SDK was subscription-based, but since the SDK has been free for over six months, continuing to limit usage to just two computers per account no longer makes sense.

Moving forward, the limit of two computers has been removed.

While logging into your account is still required, this change means that you can now install Corona on all of your computers without being told to “de-authorize” a previous computer.Â It also means that you won’t need to request a de-authorization so that you can use Corona on a different computer.

As we move toward a paid plugin marketplace, new systems will be implemented to protect plugins at the plugin level instead of at the SDK level. In the meantime, enjoy Corona SDK without limits!
